name: Knights of Hearts
description: In one small kingdom, yes, there were little knights. And the kingdom had many enemies. Including the walking dead ... Create your own character. On the choice you have a magician, a barbarian and a knight. And go hack to pieces these small but funny corpses.
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Windows 7 Процессор: DualCore Оперативная память: 512 MB ОЗУ Видеокарта: 512mb Место на диске: 50 MB
